00026 #include "cli/pch.h"
00027 
00028 #include "cli/mt_device.h"
00029 #include "cli/assert.h"
00030 
00031 CLI_NS_USE(cli)
00032 
00033 
00034 MonoThreadDevice::MonoThreadDevice(const char* const STR_DbgName, const bool B_AutoDelete)
00035   : IODevice(STR_DbgName, B_AutoDelete),
00036     m_pcliShell(NULL)
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 MonoThreadDevice::~MonoThreadDevice(void)
00041 {
00042 }
00043 
00044 const KEY MonoThreadDevice::GetKey(void) const
00045 {
00046     // As this device is mono-thread, this method should not be called.
00047     CLI_ASSERT(false);
00048     return NULL_KEY;
00049 }
00050 
00051 void MonoThreadDevice::AttachShell(Shell& CLI_Shell)
00052 {
00053     CLI_ASSERT(m_pcliShell == NULL);
00054     m_pcliShell = & CLI_Shell;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void MonoThreadDevice::DetachShell(Shell& CLI_Shell)
00058 {
00059     CLI_ASSERT(m_pcliShell == & CLI_Shell);
00060     m_pcliShell = NULL;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void MonoThreadDevice::OnKey(const KEY E_Key)
00064 {
00065     if (m_pcliShell != NULL)
00066     {
00067         m_pcliShell->OnMonoThreadKey(*this, E_Key);
00068     }
00069 }
